questions.question: 50 mm = ___ cm
questions.feedback_correct: Great! You moved the decimal correctly.

questions.question: 3 m = ___ cm
questions.feedback_correct:
Excellent! 1 m = 100 cm, 
	  so 3 m = 300 cm.
questions.feedback_wrong:
Multiply by 100 to go 
	  from meters to centimeters.

questions.question: 5 km = ___ m
questions.feedback_correct:
Nice! 1 km = 1000 m, 
	so multiply by 1000.
questions.feedback_wrong:
Move the decimal 3 places 
	  to the right for kilo to base.

questions.question: 2000 g = ___ kg
questions.feedback_correct:
Perfect! 1000 g = 1 kg, 
	  so divide by 1000.
questions.feedback_wrong:
Move the decimal 3 places left 
	  to convert grams to kilograms.

questions.question: 1 L = ___ mL
questions.feedback_correct:
Correct! 1 L = 1000 mL, 
	  so multiply by 1000.
questions.feedback_wrong:
Multiply by 1000 to go 
	  from liters to milliliters.

questions.question: 100 cm = ___ m
questions.feedback_wrong:
Divide by 100 to go 
	  from centimeters to meters.
